title: Open note taker app
text:
AS A small business owner
I WANT to be able to write and save notes
SO THAT I can organize my thoughts and keep track of tasks I need to complete.

It will open a landing page with a link to a notes pages

title: Show notes
text: Clicking on the link to the notes page, a page with existing notes listed in the left-hand column, plus empty fields to enter a new note title and the note’s text in the right-hand column.

title: Enter title and text
text: Entering a new note title and the note’s text, a Save icon appears in the navigation at the top of the page.

title: Save note
text: Clicking on the Save icon, a note is saved and appears in the left-hand column with the other existing notes

title: Open saved notes
text: Clicking on an existing note in the list in the left-hand column, that note appears in the right-hand column

title: Create a new note
text: Clicking on the Write icon in the navigation at the top of the page, an empty field appeared to enter a new note title and the note’s text in the right-hand column
